name: Power of Goo
description:
Power of Goo is a 2D Pixel Art Platformer / Metroidvania in which the player progresses through various levels, facing different obstacles, be it environmental or a hazardous enemy.

A beautiful day for Goo is interrupted in an instant as not only his home village is destroyed by horrific, dark creatures, but his wife and kids are kidnapped aswell. In an attempt to save them, Goo ends up plummeting into a dark underground with seemingly no immediate way of escape. Will he be able to find his way out and recover what he has lost?

Only you can find out. Accompany Goo through the dark caves that stretch out into the unknown and find the powers you will need to defeat your enemies.

This project was made by Team Cricket, for more information visit: https://power-of-goo.school4games.net/ 😊
